ECSchema.description: Main schema for the Grid domain, with classes used as an aid in locating structural, architectural and/or other related elements.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:SpatialLocationElement modeling a planar design grid defined in 3D space used as an aid in locating structural and design elements.
A bis:SpatialLocationElement which owns (typically non-intersecting) GridSurface elements.
A GridAxis which owns PlanCartesianGridSurface specifying position in the X direction.
A GridAxis which owns PlanCartesianGridSurface elements specifying position in the Y direction.
A GridAxis which owns PlanCircumferentialGridSurface elements specifying radial positions in a RadialGridSystem.
A GridAxis which owns PlanRadialGridSurface elements specifying angular positions in a RadialGridSystem.
A GridAxis which owns GridSurface elements specifying positions in a SketchGridSystem or FreeGridSystem.
A bis:SpatialLocationElement indicating a position along one axis of a grid by representing the intersection of a `GridSurface` of that `GridAxis` with the 'plane' of the `Grid`.
A bis:InformationRecordElement which holds information for generating label annotations for GridCurves derived from the GridLabelRecord's parent GridSurface

ECProperty.description: Controls whether the label should appear at the start of a GridCurve.
Controls whether the label should appear at end of a GridCurve.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:SpatialLocationElement serving as the base class for concrete implementations of a Grid Surface.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that relates a GridAxis to its child GridSurfaces.

ECEntityClass.description: A GridCurve representing the intersection of 2 non-planar surfaces.
A GridCurve representing the intersection of 2 planar surfaces.
A GridCurve representing the intersection of a planar and a spline surface.
A GridCurve representing the intersection of planar and arc surface.
A planar GridSurface element.
A PlanarGridSurface that is parallel to its Grid’s x-y plane (always contained in an ElevationGridSystem).

ECProperty.description: Elevation this surface is at, relevant to the GridSystem coordinate system.
Geometry of the elevation surface. Must be planar and coincident with global XY plane.

ECEntityClass.description: A GridSurface of any geometry.
A GridSurface that is parallel to an extruded arc.
A GridSurface that is parallel to an extruded spline.
A bis:SpatialLocationElement that is a collection of Grid elements and (optionally) GridSurface and related elements from which the Grids can be derived.
A GridSystem of Grids with 'planes' that are parallel to the local x-y plane.

ECProperty.description: Default elevation the surfaces in this GridSystem start from.
Default elevation the surfaces in this GridSystem end at.

ECEntityClass.description: A PlanGridSystem of Grids with orthogonal axes.

ECProperty.description: Default increment in the X direction for newly added GridSurfaces.
Default increment in the Y direction for newly added GridSurfaces.
Default surface start extension in the X direction for newly added GridSurfaces.
Default surface end extension in the X direction for newly added GridSurfaces.
Default surface start extension in the Y direction for newly added GridSurfaces.
Default surface end extension in the Y direction for newly added GridSurfaces.

ECEntityClass.description: A PlanGridSystem of Grids with a radial axis and an angular axis.

ECProperty.description: Default angle increment for newly added PlanRadialGridSurfaces in this GridSystem.
Default radius increment for newly added PlanCircumferentialGridSurface in this GridSystem.
Default start angle for newly added PlanCircumferentialGridSurface in this GridSystem.
Default end angle for newly added PlanCircumferentialGridSurface in this GridSystem.
Default start radius for newly added PlanRadialGridSurfaces in this GridSystem.
Default end radius for newly added PlanRadialGridSurfaces in this GridSystem.

ECEntityClass.description: A PlanGridSystem in which the curves of the grids are aligned to one or more axes at arbitrary angles.
A GridSystem that contains planar GridSurfaces parallel to the local XY plane. The surfaces are typically used as the 'planes' of Grids in a related `PlanGridSystem`. May or may not contain Grids.

ECProperty.description: Default elevation increment for newly added GridSurfaces.
Default surface geometry for newly added GridSurfaces.

ECEntityClass.description: A GridSystem that contains surfaces that do not need to follow any rules.
A mix-in that indicates that this Surface is suitable to be placed in a PlanGrid.

ECProperty.description: Elevation this surface is swept from, relative to the modeled PlanGridSystem placement.
Elevation this surface is swept to, relative to the modeled PlanGridSystem placement.

ECEntityClass.description: A planar GridPlanarSurface element.
A PlanGridPlanarSurface that is perpendicular to the GridSystem’s x-axis or y-axis.

ECProperty.description: Origin of the surface along the axis.
Start extent of the surface construction line.
End extent of the surface construction line.

ECEntityClass.description: A PlanGridPlanarSurface whose infinite plane contains the PlanGridSystem’s origin.

ECProperty.description: Angle in the clockwise direction from the Y axis of the RadialGridSystem defining the direction of the surface base line.
Start radius from which the surface construction line is drawn, relative to modeled GridSystem placement.
End radius to which the surface construction line is drawn, relative to modeled GridSystem placement.

ECEntityClass.description: A PlanGridPlanarSurface modeling an extruded line GridSurface element.

ECProperty.description: Surface construction line geometry relative to the modeled GridSystem placement

ECEntityClass.description: A GridArcSurface element.
A PlanGridArcSurface that is centered on the GridSystem’s origin.

ECProperty.description: Radius from the GridSystem origin at which the arc surface is swept.
Start Angle of the surface construction arc curve geometry, relative to the modeled GridSystem.
End Angle of the surface construction arc curve geometry, relative to the modeled GridSystem.

ECEntityClass.description: A PlanGridArcSurface modeling an extruded arc GridSurface element.

ECProperty.description: Surface construction arc curve geometry relative to the modeled GridSystem placement.

ECEntityClass.description: A GridSplitSurface element.
A PlanGridSplineSurface modeling a extruded spline GridSurface element.

ECProperty.description: Surface construction spline curve geometry relative to the modeled GridSystem placement
